application_title.message: Captura de pantalla página web - CodeNinjas
application_title.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

application_description.message: Captura imagenes de pagina web,editar y guardar en PDF/JPEG/GIF/PNG/BMP. Subir,imprimir,enviar al portapapeles o correo electronico
application_description.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

action_capture_entire.description: First part of the command in the popup menu: Capture entire page and (Edit, Save, Print, etc)

action_capture_visible.description: First part of the command in the popup menu: Capture visible part and (Edit, Save, Print, etc)

action_capture_selection.description: First part of the command in the popup menu: Capture selection and (Edit, Save, Print, etc)

action_capture_browser.description: First part of the command in the popup menu: Capture browser window and (Edit, Save, Print, etc)

action_resume.description: Popup menu command, opening editor and previous capture

action_open_file.description: Popup menu command, loading file into CodeNinjas

action_open_clipboard.description: Popup menu command, opens editor and captures the image from clipboard

action_options.description: Popup menu command, opens options page

action_register.description: Popup menu command, registering the Pro version

action_enter_license.description: Popup menu command, opens dialog to enter the licensing information

action_switch_pro.description: Popup menu command, switches CodeNinjas into Pro mode

action_view_demo.description: Popup menu command, opens web page in a new tab with a Flash demo

action_support.description: Popup menu command, opens web page in a new tab with the support forum

action_api.description: Popup menu command, opens web page in a new tab with some info about CodeNinjas API

action_edit.description: Popup menu command, captures web page and opens editor

action_save.description: Popup menu command, captures web page and saves it to disk as image file

action_save_pdf.description: Popup menu command, captures web page and saves it as PDF

action_copy.description: Popup menu command, captures web page and places it into clipboard as bitmap

action_email.description: Popup menu command, captures web page and sends it via email

action_external.description: Popup menu command, captures web page and opens it in a third-party editor

action_onenote.description: Popup menu command, captures web page and opens it in MS OneNote

action_upload.description: Popup menu command, captures web page and uploads it to image hosting engine

action_print.description: Popup menu command, captures web page and sends it to printer

options_label_CodeNinjas_options.description: Options page, main header of the dialog

options_label_capturing.description: Options page, label of the Capturing section

options_label_editor_options.description: Options page, label of the Editor options section

options_label_hotkey.description: Options page, label of the Hotkey section

options_label_specify_resizing_options.message: Especifique las opciones de cambio de tamaño y sonidos.

options_label_specify_editor_options.message: Especifique el editor y el ahorro de las opciones, preferencias, estilos de nomenclatura de archivos, etc.

options_label_specify_hotkey.message: Especificar la combinación de teclas para lanzar CodeNinjas:

options_button_setup.description: Options page, button caption, opens additional dialog

options_button_apply.description: Options page, button caption, applies settings

options_button_save_close.description: Options page, button caption, stores settings and closes dialog

action_license_info.description: Popup menu command, opens licensing info if CodeNinjas is Pro

action_about.description: Popup menu command, opens window about CodeNinjas
